item.title: NetEnt Tech Meetup: How to go from zero to sixty in nineteen years by Woody Zuill (@WoodyZuill), 17 Oct 2017
item.description: After meeting Woody in a number of workshops and presentations about MOB programming, it was an unique and interesting opportunity to watch him talk about a different topic. He gave an inspiring talk about randomness, confirmation bias, serendipity, learning, experimenting, or as he called it “stumbling purposely and purposeful stumbling”. All of these coming from his own life experience, with a melange of personal stories, wise words and simply beautiful drawings.
